body:
Comment 2 by **lufia@me.com**: 
I'm running Plan 9 in public QEMU/KVM service.
I inquired of the service staff whether guest cpu SSE was disabled,
but I replied from the service staff "SSE is enabled in service design."

in Plan 9, /dev/cputype is "Core i7/Xeon 2406" and /dev/archctl is below:

cpu Core i7/Xeon 2406 pge
pge on
coherence mfence
cmpswap cmpswap486
i8253set on
cache default wb
cache 0xe0000000 536870912 uc

Thanks.
